Body:
tol = 1e-06
config = axitom.Config(n_pixels_u=100, n_pixels_v=100, detector_size_u=
    100.0, detector_size_v=100.0, source_to_detector_dist=1e+20,
    source_to_object_dist=1e+20)
volume = barrel(100)
angles = [0.0]
proj = axis_sym_projection(volume, config, angles=angles)
error = np.abs(np.sum(volume, axis=1) - proj)
if np.max(error) > tol:
    self.fail()
